description:
Yes, YouTube has essentially banned us until the election.

On Friday afternoon, the left-wing activists launched their largest attack at our channel yet. We received strikes on EIGHT different videos. And one of them was from last year.

Basically, outside of the year-old one, YouTube struck each livestream since Democrats started to install Kamala Harris as their candidate. I’ll have A LOT to say about the alleged “harassment and cyberbulling” on Monday. But here’s a hint of what they dinged us for:
title: YouTube has BANNED us until the election

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Not only can Progressives turn the first world into the first world, they also turn major cities into poop capitals. For example, San Francisco is the poop capital of the United States. Many places in Canada are also suffering from an apocalypse of people Defecating in public, but this comes from actually importing the third world and not manufacturing it.
title: Politician caught lying after defending a man pooping in public at a gas station
